title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4404 - Self-Exclusion
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 4404

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 104 [1], [19], 128; L. 1940, ch. 254, § 118, as
amd. by L. 1973, ch. 346, § 4; L. 1973, ch. 414, §
5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
